title: Debug dialog
description:
This is just a debug dialog.
It is used to check if this feature is working or not.

I think it is working right ?.
Yes it is.
The text is very long for testing purpose.

title: Hydra - Victory
description: We successfully killed the Hydra your Highness! Your people seem quite pleased by the new. How about hosting a feast to celebrate this victory? We could eat the hydra at the occasion.

title: Hydra - trophy
description: Your Highness, I heard you killed a Hydra recently. I would love to have it to expose it in my hall. Of course, I will give you some gold in exchange of such a lovely trophy. Best regard, Lord Loniriss

title: Hydra - to sell
description: My salutations your Highness, I hope this letter find you well. The word about you killing a hydra reach my ears. For a mutual profit, I offer to you to give me the body, I will sell it and, of course, we will share the money I could get from it.
